name: SpaceBotched
description:
SpaceBot is a 2D platformer about a little SpaceBot named "Botched".
The artificial gravity machines are broken ... help Botched to collect the gravity orbs ("E") and release them in the gravity machine ("R"). 
The gravity is low, so Botched has a floaty jump, but the gravity orbs are heavy and will weigh him down a lot.
Move: WASD (or arrow keys), SPACE to jump.

This is my very first game. It may not be amazing, but I'm still very proud of it. <3
